mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.medium_id as mediumId, t.order_id as orderId, t.wechat_number as wechatNumber, t.gender as gender, t.birth_date as birthDate, t.education as education, t.height as height, t.living_place as livingPlace, t.marriage as marriage, t.trade as trade, t.profession as profession, t.month_income as monthIncome, t.house as house, t.is_car as isCar, t.personal as personal, t.standard as standard, t.pictures as pictures, t.status as status, t.create_date as createDate, t.is_protect as isProtect, t.level as level, t.created as created, t.updated as updated
